title: Additional incentive for Cluster Redevelopment : The total permissible built up area for Cluster S
clause_text: Additional incentive for Cluster Redevelopment : The total permissible built up area for Cluster S.R.S. of Pune and Pimpri-Chinchwad S.R.A. areas shall be the sum total of Rehabilitation component area and Free sale component area, calculated as per the ratios
section: REGULATIONS RELATING TO REHABILITATION AND FREE SALE COMPONENTS â€“
